channel.title: [718] Vivicide HD 24/7 - PvP Economy, Spawning, Killstreak Rewards
channel.description:
[left][size=7]Vivicide HD 24/7[/size] Hosted 24/7 on a dedicated server [b]Owner[/b]: Fox2007
[url=http://foxscapepro.com/mybb/misc.php?page=WebClient][size=2em][font=trebuchet ms]Click here to Play Now![/font][/size][/url] Alternatively, [url=http://foxscapepro.com/mybb/misc.php?page=download]Download the Client[/url][/left] [left][font=trebuchet ms][size=2em]Basic Server Features List:[/size][/font] [/left] [ul][li]PvP Based Economy[/li] [li]Killstreak System with Rewards[/li] [li]Edgeville home with Shops[/li] [li]Set your own levels![/li] [li]Spawn unlimited Starters![/li] [li]Lots of commands![/li] [li]Challenging Bosses![/li] [li]PvP Shop with Tokens[/li] [li]No need to donate for good stuff![/li] [li]Flawless Switching[/li] [li]Hybriding (::hybrid)[/li] [li]Skilling for Extra Money[/li] [li]Full Duel Arena with Staking![/li][/ul] [size=2em]Planned Development:[/size]
[ul][li]A main quest line[/li] [li]More items in PvP Store[/li] [li]Donate Tokens[/li][/ul] [size=2em] Media:[/size]

item.title: [718] Vivicide HD 24/7 - PvP Economy, Spawning, Killstreak Rewards
item.dc:creator: @TannerRSC TannerRSC
item.description:
@TannerRSC wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:12, topic:470128”][quote author=TannerRSC link=topic=587507.msg4177472#msg4177472 date=1355149873]
A couple of updates have been done, join now and see what more we plan to give you.
[/quote]

Why not list it in the Topic?[/quote]

here you go:
The Ability to Spawn Items at the cost of GP per item
Starter Cash of 500k
Moved Skill Shops to a more Relevant Location
Added a command to spawn directly into your bank

Read full topic
